00001 package de.unibi.techfak.bibiserv.biodom.logging;
00002 
00003 import java.util.logging.Formatter;
00004 import java.util.logging.LogRecord;
00005 
00013 public class BioDOMFormatter extends Formatter {
00014 
00015     /*
00016      * (non-Javadoc)
00017      * 
00018      * @see java.util.logging.Formatter#format(java.util.logging.LogRecord)
00019      */
00020     @Override
00021     public String format(LogRecord arg0) {
00022         return "BIODOM(" + arg0.getLevel() + "):" + arg0.getMessage() + " at {" + arg0.getSourceClassName() + "}"
00023                 + arg0.getSourceMethodName() + System.getProperty("line.separator");
00024     }
00025 
00026 }
